<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mage Hunter](/Feats.aspx?ID=1610) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 109 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[superstition instinct](/Instincts.aspx?ID=6)

**Trigger**
A creature within your reach Casts a Spell.

</column>

---

You use your hatred of magic to lash out at the sight of spellcasting, allowing you to interrupt an enemy's spell. Make a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit, you disrupt the spell.
name: Mage Hunter
